TITLE: Should New York give migrants free luxury hotel rooms? Americans weigh in
SUMMARY: People in New York City expressed their thoughts on the Mayor Eric Adams' plan to use hotel rooms as housing for migrants arriving from Texas by the busload.

TITLE: Fire rips through Massachusetts boat yard, black smoke seen for miles
SUMMARY: A large fire in a Massachusetts boat yard destroyed several boats, buildings and vehicles Friday, creating enough smoke that it was picked up by weather radar.

TITLE: Chowchilla school bus hijacking victim credits kidnappers for his life's victories, has met all 3 in person
SUMMARY: Larry Park and Lynda Carrejo Labendeira were both aboard a bus hijacked from Chowchilla, California, in July 1976. But both have different perspective about recent events.

TITLE: Washington school shooter sentenced to 40 years in prison for 2017 rampage at Freeman High School
SUMMARY: Spokane County Superior Court Judge Michael Price sentenced Caleb Sharpe to 40 years in prison for shooting four students, one fatally, at Freeman High School in 2017.

TITLE: Atlanta man arrested after allegedly spray-painting swastikas on rainbow crosswalk, SWAT standoff
SUMMARY: A man suspected of vandalizing rainbow crosswalks in Atlanta was taken into custody. He allegedly spray-painted a swastika onto the crosswalk on two separate occasions.

TITLE: Utah Lt. Gov. Deidre Hendersonâ€™s cousin killed in apparent murder-suicide involving ex-partner
SUMMARY: Utah Lt. Gov. Deidre Henderson's cousin was recently shot and killed in what appears to be a murder-suicide. The two deceased had previously been in a relationship.

TITLE: Chicago advisory panel recommends permanently removing Christopher Columbus statues
SUMMARY: A Chicago panel recommended the city's three Christopher Columbus statues be permanently removed, and that the city consider altering or removing around 40 other monuments.

TITLE: Maryland USPS worker robbed at knife-point in front of a $3 million home: police
SUMMARY: The Montgomery County Police Department said a USPS mail service worker was robbed in an affluent Maryland neighborhood this week. The worker was not injured in the robbery.

TITLE: Minnesota man told his 5 kids to go play in the basement before shooting their mother, himself: police
SUMMARY: St. Paul police said a Minnesota husband and wife were found dead in their home in what is believed to be a murder-suicide. Their five children were in the home at the time.

TITLE: Louisiana mother and daughter charged with animal cruelty after dog training video surfaces online
SUMMARY: A mother and daughter from Louisiana were charged after an investigation into a social media video that appeared to show a dog being abused at their training facility.
